    • Uses of Content in fr.sii.ogham.core.message.content

      Subinterfaces of Content in fr.sii.ogham.core.message.content 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DecoratorContent
      Interface for decorator pattern.
      interface  MayHaveStringContent
      Marker interface to indicate that the content can be directly available as string.
      interface  UpdatableDecoratorContent
      Interface that allows to update the decorated content.
      interface  UpdatableStringContent
      Marker interface that allows to update the content.
      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.message.content that implement Content 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MultiContent
      Decorator content that provide ability to handle several sub contents.
      class  MultiTemplateContent
      A shortcut for using several templates with same context.
      class  ParsedContent
      Represent a content that original content comes from a template.
      class  StringContent
      Represent a string content.
      class  StringTemplateContent
      Content that contains a template.
      class  TemplateContent
      Content that points to a template.
      class  TemplateVariantContent
      Content that points to a template variant.
